Class AVLTree.AVLNode<E>

java.lang.Object
BinaryTree.Node<E>
AVLTree.AVLNode<E>
Type Parameters:
E - The data type of objects stored in the node. Must be a Comparable object.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Enclosing class:
AVLTree<E extends Comparable<E>>
private static class AVLTree.AVLNode<E> extends BinaryTree.Node<E>
Class to represent an AVL Node. It extends the BinaryTree.Node by adding the balance field
